content: I am not sure if this is considered a HAPI question. I am trying to use HAPI based sandboxes (Logica and Meld) and create a patient who can authenticate through OAuth2. I am managing to create a "Persona" of a patient, and it gets a username "patientname@NameOfSandBox", and a password I have chosen. However, on either of the two sandboxes, when I am later presented with the login screen as part of an OAuth2 Smart-on-FHIR workflow, I cannot use this login (unknown username or password). The same happens when I create a practitioner persona. Only my sandbox admin account can login. Any pointers?
